Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is a remake of multiplayer part of HL1, the basic premise being that they ported same material off original GoldSrc engine to Source engine. The turrets there became unusuable, there is strange flying grate texture over lifts, it has double windows for some reason. Not pretty.
So, stick to original Half-Life if you want multiplayer.

Annoyances:

- Strange looking gloss on weapons.

- Weapons feel clunky" compared to the original game.

- Changing playermodels in the menu does not work (can be changed via console though).
